body:
Thanks for the feedback! If your issue is related to the Flutter framework itself,
please open an issue at
[github.com/flutter/flutter](https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/new).

## Steps to Reproduce

_Please tell us what you were doing and what went wrong_


## Version info

Please paste the output of running `flutter doctor -v` here (available from the command
line or from `Tools > Flutter > Flutter Doctor`). It will provide the version of the
Flutter framework as well as of the IntelliJ plugin.

comment_data.body:
We'll need more info to help.

What does this mean: 'add "Path_Provider" dependency'?
What does "can't build" mean?

Give us some screenshots or textual error messages to work with.

Please add the output of `flutter doctor -v`.

let me make it more clear. i dont have any issue in flutter environment and despite of this after installing path_provider i can't run the app and this is my error message:


Thanks for the info! This looks like a versioning issue. You might be able to resolve it from the instructions here:
https://flutter.dev/docs/development/packages-and-plugins/using-packages#conflict-resolution

Or it might need to be solved by path_provider devs.
This issue was moved by [stevemessick](https://github.com/stevemessick) to [flutter/flutter#49295](https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/49295).

title: I Can't build a flutter project after add "Path_Provider" dependency, it's a problem....
